Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.board

Class FaithTrack

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.board.FaithTrack
public class FaithTrack extends Object
Class FaithTrack is a representation of the Faith Track on a player's board. It is composed by 25 tiles and reaching the end of the Track is one way to end the game.
Author:
Alessio Piovesan, Pier Giorgio Prosperi, Matteo Salamone
